summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding the official conclusion of Jeffrey Epstein's cause and manner of death by the New York City Medical Examiner's Office (OCME). It states the death was ruled a suicide by hanging.

persons.name: Berman, Geoffrey
persons.context: Recipient of an internal email update regarding the official conclusion of Jeffrey Epstein's cause and manner of death by the Medical Examiner.

events.title: OCME Concludes Epstein's Death a Suicide
events.description: The New York City Medical Examiner's Office (OCME) officially concluded Jeffrey Epstein's cause of death was hanging and the manner of death was suicide, and planned to issue a press release and death certificate.

keyFacts: The New York City Medical Examiner's Office (OCME) officially ruled Jeffrey Epstein's cause of death as hanging and the manner of death as suicide.
The conclusion was communicated to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on August 16, 2019.
OCME planned to issue a press release and the official death certificate later that same afternoon.
